column2: `` samuel adams james warren january 1 1777 dear sir baltimore jany 1. 1777 determind omit opportunity writing although seldom late receivd letter. second favor came hands days ago inclosing copies papers spain. much obligd. affairs europe look well additional measures taken establish part world solid foundation. assure business done since came place satisfaction every thing done excepting declaration independence made immediately l9th april 75. ministers abroad directed assure foreign courts notwithstanding artful insidious representations emissaries britain contrary congress people united states determind maintain independence events. 1 done success arms jersey doubtless receivd intelligence letter reach. generals sullivan green commanded two divisions. enemy made lee prisoner convincd great abilities beat without. think britain make contemptible figure america europe must still make utmost exertions. pray let levies required state raisd possible expedition. conveyance resolution vesting large powers general washington limitted time. 2 became opinion necessary. hint gave time ago still think important. genl gates arrivd day yesterday. conversd upon. told conceivd wishes measure may tryed. requires secrecy dispatch. 3 lt colo stuart set tomorrow directions proceed far boston purchase ordnance stores procured elsewhere. general gates aid de camp clever. wish would take notice. 4 called. adieu friend ``

`` benjamin franklin honble. sir baltimore 1 january 1777 congress relying wisdom integrity well knowing great importance case appointed commissioner negotiate treaty friendship commerce court spain. idea congress subject find instructions congress sent opportunity commissioners court france. commission special service honor inclose. 1 great respect esteem honble. sir yr. obedt. huml servts. benja harrison jno witherspoon richard henry lee hooper ``

`` elbridge gerry joseph hawley dear sir baltimore 1 jany 1777 time inclose express going copy letter recd general washington. 1 middle states roused late supine state exerting reinforce army hope proper spirit exercised occasion enemy driven jersies. general makes mention corps accomplished affair believe find principally countrymen wish see distinctions made think raise laudable emulation justice ought always january 1 1777 done enterprizing officers men. great commendations given officers men general gates unwell sent last campaign ticonderoga. wish may know conduct done honor. attentive raise new levies attach men service supporting credit continental money paying cloathing arming subsisting well. let us exert purposes twelve months blessing god doubt shall see independence america established foundation shaken arms tyranny. pray recommend inhabitants country supply commissary vegetables vinegar want thousands died last campaign. adjournment congress place confess gave pain air much exhilirating capital measures touching foreign affairs taken think serviceable hope whole prove serviceable. congratulate success army salute compliments season sir much esteem sincerely e gerry p.s. tories must exported bonds answer purpose prisons sufficiency worth hanging. observe good act word `` colony\ `` used. look like diffidence right terms `` independant state `` ``

`` john hancock joseph trumbull sir jany 1st. 1777 wrote days ago express 1 sent letter govr. send thro channels. time beg particular attention foregoing resolutions congress 2 inform general washington vested ful powers conduct every department. wish happy esteem sir huml servt john hancock predt ``

`` john hancock george washington sir baltimore jany lt. 1777 acknowledge receipt several favours 27th ulto. letter date containing agreeable intelligence success continental arms command last night delivered aid de camp colo. baylor together hessian standard. 1 entertain pleasing expectation affairs henceforth assume better complexion. account behaviour spirit troops gave highest satisfaction congress manifests disposition may prove forerunner future success. considering unfavourable temper men broken fatigue ill-fortune happy event expedition appears extraordinary. troops properly inspired animated confidence leader often exceed expectation limits probability. entirely wisdom conduct united states indebted late success arms pleasure must naturally feel occasion pure unmixt may still proceed manner acquire glory disinterested magnanimous behaviour highly merit. enclose copy resolves transmitted genl. schuyler relative northern department also sundry resolves relative immediate department congress come since wrote last. 2 forwarded states copies resolves vesting powers pleasure transmitting last accompanied letters explaining reasons congress acted particular. 3 enclosed resolve percieve congress determined horse properly caparisoned presented aid de camp colo. baylor recommend promote colonel regiment light horse. congress pleased entrust execution resolve must beg favour give directions quarter master proper person purchase handsome horse purpose found. reason making application information received light horse taken trenton publickly sold benefit soldiery. case must ask favour give directions time purchase one two use. money shall immediately remitted whatever may. glad know kind horse furniture think proper would means wish procure best without advice assistance apprehensive shall succeed. horses pleased january 1 1777 order sent every expence shall paid arising thereon. recommendation colo. baylor doubt meet approbation return virginia give commission pay shall think suitable adequate. wishing sincerely compliments season honour every sentiment esteem regard sir obedt. hble servt. john hancock presidt p.s. shall send letter books first safe hand. 4 oppory. send four bundles containg two hundred commissions rest shall immediately follow. 5 ``

`` william hooper joseph hewes dear hewes baltimore jany 1 1777 favoured two letters capt. allon. lament hard fortune unless measures immediately taken prevent infamous practices privateers america soon state general confusion-one part warring another defenceless southern colonies become devoted prey formidable eastern neighbours. laid letter relative capture brig joseph congress without embellishment reserve. new england gentlemen felt force imputation considered general. order president write president council mass'tts requesting make immediate enquiry vessell pirates taken secure report immediately congress. also procured reference letter marine committee hope take spirited january 1 1777 resolves avenge injury done prevent repetition unjustifiable depredations. morris requested letter wrote yesterday enclosing correspond upon subject exert utmost endeavours interest congress favour application publick epistle honours. done present hear particularly shall prosecute every expedient improve information benefit. 1 congress upon part g. howe 's army advancing within 9 miles cooper 's ferry advices mifflin putnam removed dirty infamous extravagant hole possible oeconomy live rate 50/ per day every necessary life double cost us philadelphia left every thing enormous. letter accompanies send account signal success obtained trenton. already fine effect upon recruiting service one reg't whose term enlistment expired reenlisted man since event. operated contrary effects enemy-as learn pannic struck. certain 2000 bordentown moved towards princeton great precipitation carried stores. state general washingtons army pretty nearly follows. lees detachments brought east side hudsons river -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- 2300 effective men continental regiments -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -2700 genl cadwallader 1200 militia -- -- -- -- -- -1200 genl ewen perhaps many -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -1200 militia come coming fast since battle make perhaps -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- _2000 10000 genl washington imagine enter jersies attempt drive enemy back new york. succeed cause safe apprehensions philadelphia end. howe 12,000 jersies headquarters brunswick principal part army collected outposts called small force princeton. genl washington newton bucks county plot formed family happily defeated early discovery tories intentions. lee 's capture surprizes us. taken 2 miles army stopped write answers dispatches. man neighbourhood immediately rode brunswick 25 miles distant gave information 80 90 light horse immediately dispatched command col harcourt arrived 10 oclock morning surprised lee aid de camps 6 number writing table. guard 10 men men unfortunately little distance house cut communication genl. lee seized denied privilige taking hat shoes. one aid de camp 's wounded small conflict maintained defence general. taken princeton-thence brunswick hear indifferently used intend hear send england. stockden hear taken enemy 8 miles home carried brunswick confined close jail. 2 andrew john allen gone enemy. dickinson little questionable believe guilty till much better evidence guilt present. several frigates cruizing delaware. several intended southward. much news. think rather hardly used notwithstanding many letters convention single line. delegate. penn writes obtained assurances sent expresses doubtfully interested favor. latter might spared trouble. services rendered carolina publick character secure unsollicited unanimous reappointment country want court fatigue worn duties office nothing heaven wish promote cause liberty kept family private concerns till. 3 adieu dear friend. remember affectionately friends edenton. shew iredell jones body else excuse precipitation scrawled consider thrown crude inteligence paper midst publick assembly ten thousand things divert attention. truly w h p besides force aforementioned genl. heath retaken fort lee hackinsack town stores prisoners. heath 2000 ``

`` marine committee john baldwin sir 1 january 1st. 1777 mr. patterson going egg harbour take care management prizes place probable may return present cruize hereby directed receipt letter send immediately return provisions stores wanted compleat wasp three months voyage. send also list men account slops clothing may necessary ordered proceed europe. may heave schooner get good order return express make returns ordered service mentioned things necessary shall sent. keep orders. mr. patterson supply money expences arise vessel egg harbour wanted write us. behalf marine comee hble servant r morris v. p january 1 1777 ``

`` robert morris george washington sir philada. jany 1st. 1777 honoured favour yesterday mr howell late last night ever solicitous comply requisitions early morning dispatch supply fifty thousand dollars excellency. 1 receive sum letter got away early cou 'd wish none concerned movement except. shall rouse immediately. gives great pleasure engaged troops continue occasional supplys money necessary may depend exertions either publick private capacity. year 1776. heartily glad hope america ever plagued another. let us accept success trentown presage future fortunate events impression sincerely wish successful campaign 1777 crown immortal honours reward dangers fatigues war may many many years enjoy sweets peace domestick happiness reward social virtues. sincere esteem regard ever sir obedt servant robt morris ``

`` matthew thornton meshech weare hond sir baltimore jany 1d 1777 weakness eyes since small pox reason done self honor write honble. council house oftener large. present bearer waits time say general washington gain 'd two considerable victories enemies america congress expects every moment news grand engagement. news must refer news papers. lead beleive mistaks neither know beleive current reports uncertain. january 1 1777 favoured one letter publick privat since left house. would take great honor receive letter worthy friend. 1 worthy college col. whipple well. pray sir take trouble present compliments honble council house except obedient sir hble sert. matthew thornton ``

`` oliver wolcott andrew adams. sir 1 baltimore 1 jany. 1777 favour 30 novr came hand last evening sincerely thank. wrote 15 nov. hope recd. 2 observations necessity establishing respectable army judgment proper. congress empowered genl washington raise 16 battalions addition already granted 3,000 cavalry. also given genl power six months conduct descretion operations war establish magazines call upon militia necessary regulate every department army displace appoint officer rank brigadr. genl. c. word whole military department put hand six months. upon preservation civil liberties people present time depends upon full exertion military power. embargo six months laid upon salted provisions. 3 matters publick intelligence referr enclosed hope may obtain advantages agt enemy jersys. congress moment going. say must army carry war without one new peice business. ought provided best manner without discipline serviceable bring one feild much better provided disciplined governed hitherto. word believe get army good one-more happy beneficial publick yet. great complaints made assemblys appointed great numbers insufficient officers neglected apparent merit. kindness particularly exacts gratitude. wish less sensible injury recd. exercised power answer sinister purposes injury easily forgive january 1 1777 men hope may deserve forgiveness maker. loss deserve. god forbid villany shall ever induce relax endeavours serve country farr able. saw baseness mens design effect undertaking good degree contrary opinion undertook therefore ought suffer. generally tho't pritty inflexible opinion. certainly study. compliments mrs. adams candor accept hasty sketch sir obedient humble servant oliver wolcott ``

`` oliver wolcott laura wolcott dear baltimore 1 janry 1777 wrote 25t 13t last since nothing material occurred except battle near trenton american army took 918 prisoners killed 20 30 took 4 colors 6 brass feild pieces c particular acco. . hope may flatter advantage soon obtained quarter. yet heard troops went r island hope designs frustrated. nothing consequence southward. long congress continue depend contingences. wish might long infinitely dirty place ever. one walk boots. air paths condition us latter end march beginning april. weather suppose continue near two months. place said healthy sure extremely uncomfortable. blessing god well otherwise cold hope pass long. best regards family freinds hope god protect bless. take care health make cares life easy. prosperous happy times trust return country god grant us peace happiness former days january 2 1777 happiness sincerely covet tho trust shall never wish peace loss security country-for leave children equal advantages civil religious liberty. measure acquainted treatment personally recd. number countrymen. easily forgive every one diabolical insidious manner brot situation impossible extricate utmost dificulty. kind conduct however reasonable proper necessary would expose villanous imputation kind mind capable least degree sensibility must deeply affected. try forgive tho god knows hard work. regard mr lyman excuse writing oftner. little spare time oblidged attend upon business steadily deligates yet come connecticut. 1 wishing happy new year god would safely conduct thro events present year subscribe sincere inviolable affection oliver wolcott ``

`` samuel adams arthur lee dear sir baltimore jan 2 1777 altogether regard safety restraind continuing part correspondence obliging enough indulge several years. know well avowal warm attachmt cause justice truth renderd exceedingly obnoxious malice british king ministers letter written zealous asserter cause addressed power would intercepted brought upon resentment cruel vindictive court. omit opportunity writing long silence assure still heartily engagd according small ability supporting rights america mankind. last letter near two years ago 1 ventured give opinion british troops boston attempt january 2 1777 march hostile manner would surely effect total perpetual separation two countrys. short time great event since taken place sooner indeed expected would though opinion soon justice might sound policy ought. timidity nature prevents taking decisive part critical time fortitude enough tell tyrant determind free. delay dangerous us yet attended one advantage. afforded world strong proof oppressed insulted willing give britain time recollect correct errors. enduring sharp conflict confiding righteous heaven look indifferent eye upon cause manifestly interesting mankind. called act still enlarged sphere. go friend support liberty virtue. already applause virtuous men may assured smiles heaven. brother mr. r h lee give particular account affairs america. nothing therefore remains add affectionate friend sa ``

`` larkin hammond sir baltimore 2 january 1777 proceed dispatch power schooner jenifer command nantes france arrival apply mr. thomas morris port application must messrs pliarne penet co. furnish necessary cash journey paris place must set immediately deliver dispatches messrs. deane franklin lee wait orders discharge return utmost diligence america put convenient port southward delaware. 1 think chincoteague back eastern shore likely avoiding men war would therefore attempt getting one ports arrived must leave schooner command mate bring dispatches congress wherever may sitting. set paris consult mr. morris gentlemen whether vessel likely escape january 2 1777 enemy sending port meet return opinion give orders mate accordingly. also deliver pig iron order gentlemen take quantity military stores ballast vessel. safe delivery dispatches entrusted obtaining answers matters immense consequence continent strongly recommend avoiding vessels may see either outward bound return. also avoid much possible falling headlands islands usual men war cruize places. dispatches delivered box must put bag two shots case falling enemy escape may prepared sink event 's happening earnestly insist. wish good voyage safe return yr. humble servts b. harrison r.h. lee p.s. arrive nantes enquire get directions gentlemen recommended cash carry paris dr. franklin mr. deane mr. arthur lee lodge paris things take care let known nantes whence came business going except gentlemen ``

`` executive committee john hancock sir philada. jany 2d. 1777 enclosed dispatches general 1 mr. palfrey come hand sent latters express back informed remitted fifty thousand dollars genl. washington yesterday purpose paying bounty ten dollars troops reinlist six weeks time told letters shou 'd sent forward directly doubt necessary supply money sent soon possible. please observe fund almost exhausted. mr. commissary wharton called us morning sixty thousand dollars granted forty january 2 1777 thousand promise expended. mr. wharton drawn us 80,000 dollars 50,000 lent council safety repay supply comes 50,000 sent genl. washington 20000 remains made payments however shall draw loan office occasion may require think might adviseable lodge fund 200,000 dollars mr mease ready exigencys may happen. generals letter gives state army need add subject except assure gather daily strength militia. sincerely wish may last time american militia called forth field measure thought destructive could devised. enemies ships still remain bay fear immense damage intercepting numerous necessary supplys. capt hammond discharged 47 prisoners consequence mr morris 's letter 2 part come mr bevan rest road arrives shall know terms dismissed. randolph hornet several vessells still remain piers waiting favourable opening push. lt colo johnson major frazer waynes pensylvania battalion called us morning say men corps good soldiers america reinlist condition permitted return home. terms granted complied doubt getting every man officers wou 'd prefer fresh hands. told congress matter upon representation genl schuyler c pressed us exceedingly mention matter congress urged favour pensylvania jersey troops sent soon possible garrison easily maintained eastern militia untill new regiments formed ordered. search person understands casting brass canon. mr byers new jersey heard time. shall write continue search others. great respect remain sir obedient servts robt morris geo clymer geo walton ``

`` executive committee william palfrey sir january 2nd 1777 letter congress yesterday office shall dispatch baltimore express. concur engagements soldiry times complied shall recommend congress send sufficient supply money. consequence request excellency general yesterday sent fifty thousand dollars purpose paying 10 dollars bounty mentioned hope army suffer nothing untill get supply. sir yr. mst obt serts. p.s. send six sticks sealing wax ``

`` elbridge gerry joseph trumbull dear sir baltimore 2d jany 1777 favour 23d decr come hand inclosed orders congress emporting flower rice. wrote young gentleman stopped philadelphia. capt doughty go 4th 5th 400000 dollars loan office certificates either sent express care new england commissioners also receive necessary directions.i move morning warrant loan offices connecticut massachusetts 300000 dollars favour answers mentioned letter relative business. 1 informed new york paper copy letter c. g. memr congress wherein colo reed censured seen heard directed-but shall surprized. 2 congratulate success arms trentown men embrace every favourable oppertunity give tests courage ever indulged martial inclinations. regiments detachment attacked enemy reeds poor 's starks n.h. glover 's sergeant 's hutchinson 's patterson 's graton 's m.b. durky 's ct. varnum 's r.i. stone 's maryd. reads weadons lauson 's scot 's buckner 's virga making whole 2500. public apprized hereof justice brave may excite nobler acts raise laudable emulation free envy boasting thro america. january 2 1777 lexington continental frigate 14 guns arrived morning cape francois ten days since captured thirty two gun frigate. officers taken twelve fifteen men put board wind high lost one boats unable add number consequence wch. crew lexington retook vessel arrived following cargo 1400 ells cloaths coatg 500 ells flannel 300 oznab 1 bbl. salt petre 200 thousand needles 636 thousand pins 366 reams paper 386 blankets 12 3/4 tons sulphur 5000 flints 500 stand arms bayonets 7 1/2 tons lead 8 tons powder. 3 remain sir much esteem friend humble serv e gerry jany 3d. order proposed first part letter passed congress enclosed. think necessary inform loan office commissioners may best supplyed money inform treasurer may send order accordingly. evening. come visit good friend general gates recovery doubtless give pleasure. suspect mercenary party albany endeavoured gravel supplying army find certain times two months six weeks least provisions garrison supply number days. matter serious concern enemy investing garrison time would oblige give battle upon terms retreat way new road n e states. pray inform whether establish magazine provisions bennington army 10000 men three months keep usual supplys notwithstandg opposition without assistance albany gentlemen whether would good plan direct certain quantity provided near albany york convention general schuyler supply militia may occassionally come answer demands may found necessary next campaign. also quality provisions quantity thus ordered. think powers connections may render needless done without interfering department think least chance 's necessary advise thereto shall adopted. bearer brings certificates commissioner loan offices n england ``

`` john hancock ebenezer hancock dear brother baltim e. 2 jany. 1777 handed coll. stewart friend mine gentleman amiable character spirited officer. 1 desire particular attention exercise every civility power accommodate bed house stay boston short beg every thing power render col steward 's abode boston agreeable possible. wrote mr bant. 2 introduce col stewart friends. wish happy 's affectionately john hancock ``

`` john hancock robert morris sir baltimore jany. 2d. 1777. acknowledge receipt several favours 20th. ulto. immediately laid congress. enclosed resolves inform measures congress haw taken relative northern army copy forwarded genl. schuyler. 1 transmit copy circular letter congress ordered sent states consequence vesting commander chief large extensive powers enclosed last. 2 minute informed captain boyce marines board lexington taken pearle frigate capes delaware. weather proving extremely bad seven hands put board. consequence lexington 's crew rose taken possession brought safe harbour. loaded powder arms dry goods. shall order immediately unloaded dispatch fast possible. must ask favour send next express half ream good writing paper two pounds best sealing wax box january 2 1777 wafers three hundred best quills. excuse trouble give believe great regard sir obed. hble servt. john hancock presidt. p.s. always inclose whole resolves genl. washington shall always copies. please order letter council safety deliver 'd. 3 several packetts seven number general washington pray send express letter new jersey executive power please forward tho second thought inclose general ``

`` thomas nelson thomas jefferson dear jefferson baltimore jany 2d 1777 colo. zane delivered letters town power execute desir 'd gave desir 'd would negotiate bill transact business promis 'd. affairs black appearance two last months say devil black painted. last turn 'd tables upon scoundrels surprize see enclos 'd paper. unfortunate us ewing cadwalader could get river almost certain would surprized large detachment hessians mount holly probably would taken greatest part. number prisoners exceeds general makes 500. always moderate. could get good regular army soon clear continent damn 'd invaders. play devil girls even old women satisfy libidinus appetities. scarcely virgin found part country pass 'd thro yet jersies turn. rapes rapine murder sufficient rouse resentment people. sufficient provocations dispair thing working opposition. friends john andrew william allen general howe dickeson know imagined board roebuck. gentleman giving vote repeatedly congress emission continental money wrote brother receive payment debts letter intercepted council safety. 1 deserve. allens humm 'd finely went howe little doubt would shortly possession philada indeed might play 'd cards well hopes take place treated deserve. vilest rascals city neighbourhood philadelphia ever existed. general inform 'd nights ago conspiracy form 'd people bucks county near camp kidnap poor lee prudence caught manner however disposition inhabitants county appears inimical cause knew. adieu thos nelson jr. p.s. dont like long letters. little friend hopkinson suffer 'd greatly free booters destroy 'd furniture cabinet curiosities fine january 3 1777 harpsicord told best ever came america. little chance tellescope. old weatherspoon escap 'd fury. burnt library. grieves much lost controversial tracts. would lay aside cloth take revenge. believe would send devil could sure would. thus endeth postscript ``

`` samuel chase maryland council safety gentlemen baltimore town jany 3d 1777 congress received letters general washington since 29th. informed private letters forces 10,000 jerseys enemy retreating. certain genl. heath retaken hackensack prisoners. mr. shearman delegate connecticut informs enemy possession new port rhode island 10,000 collected oppose. enclosed petition put hands. board make proper enquiry grant redress. captain yates delivered enclosed. mr. carroll informs application heretofore made congress relative case milne jenkins declined giving opinion. given state case georgia delegates write subject. 1 general smallwood communicate directions congress shall procure money soon signed shall forward general sum enable expedite new levies. doubt ready concurrence assistance board. success procuring new army depends. wish would give line officer may apply money signify sum shall advance. think would proper full board consider propriety convening general assembly. state yet unrepresented. gent. respect regard obedt. servt. saml. chase ``

`` executive committee john hancock sir philada. jany 3d. 1777,10 oclock a.m. express arrived morning enclosed letters rhode island one mr tillinghast informs arrival alfred boston prize ship millish port bedford mr. ellery may probably give state enemies forces rhode island letters directed genl. lee mr morris opened knowing degree entrusted private affairs publick business proves case contents ought known. express brought letters dispatched governor cooke therefore suppose letters mr. ellery consequence. 1 none opened made necessary incur charges jaded well horse told wait return answer mr ellery instructions respecting shall complyed. moment utmost state anxiety reason think engagement commenced morning decision important consequences america. capt james nicholson frigate virga. came trenton hour ago says genl mifflin genl cadwallader joined genl. washington yesterday forenoon immagines plan attacking enemy concerted executed day ld stirling 's colo hands brigades sent trenton road prince town yester forenoon one oclock fired alarm guns three miles trenton met enemy pressed superiour numbers two brigades supported retreating engagement time untill sunset joined main army taken post drawn high grounds side trenton bridge. loss two brigades capt nicholson thinks inconsiderable saw two three wounded men come dont immagine whole loss amount 100 men. says troops must suffered much severe cold last night. much harrassed cou 'd get comfortable sleep whilst two armies near advance guards 100 yards. certainty enemies numbers saw judges might 6 7000. morning heard engaged hopes attack made people. says opinion general officers shou 'd make attack morning events thinks obliged beat enemy cut pieces boat canoe trenton burlington attempt retreat thinks enemy press destruc- january 3 1777 tion. thus sir waiting event important action write think may prepared give quick dispatch express hear farther. council safety dispatching gondolos craft ready service may offer happiness old ice gone new made. hold readiness whatever circumstances may require us happy indeed shall give good news close letter. 6 oclock evening. waited impatiently day fresh accounts trenton person come thence since capt nicholson mr. tod coachmaker one light horse city. says left camp 2 oclock morning give us acct capt nicholson already done says also heard 10 canon fired morning others insist heard brisk canonade daylight 10 11 oclock said town country short sir sorry send express imperfect accounts fear night inform heard may alarmed travellers reports give congress immense pain. therefore dispatch express keep another ready morning begging uneasy untill hear us event good bad shall informed thing depended comes knowledge. time must observe met severe check wou 'd numbers tell news. get better willing share glory last fly tell us passing. remain formidable nobody dispatched tell us therefore longer remain suspence favourable may conjectures. sorry close letter one disagreable piece intelligence. capt hallock late brigt lexington appeared little since taken pearle man war gale wind high enemy take proper possession sent midshipman seven men onboard took hallock lieutt officers night intending secure better next morning parted hallock thinks officers retaken carried port. took brigt bay honduras ordered first safe port. mortifyed exceedingly affair genl washington drives back enemy trenton seek revenge great respect remain sir obedt servants. committee robt morris p.s. excuse bad pen ink haste ``

`` william whipple john langdon dear sir baltimore 3d jany 1777 time ago desired look two fast sailing vessels 60 80 tons send iron flour use navy since instructed marine committee desire immediately send two vessels place articles. 1 hope difficulty chartering considerable advantage state new hampshire great part flour may disposed wanted undoubtedly case. 'll address vessels messrs saml robert purviance merchant give possible dispatch liberty ship two three thousand dollars value articles best suit market informed price current inclosed govt. conveyance 'll receive directions secret committee load ship masts france purchase one suitable masts. 2 article acceptable time january 4 1777 probability nation eve war. also desired send two small vessels st peters procure suitable cargos market. apprehensive 'll want money time get business sent soon let know sums 'll want. wish constantly advised proceeding wants may keep supplied. last letter rec 'd 25th novr. 3 since last lexington arrived cape. bound philadelphia taken pearl frigate 32 guns capes took officers put board 7 8 men roughness weather prevented taking people 70 number cover night brought arrived safe valuable cargo powder arms woolen goods c. also another brig arrived place sort cargo amounted 200.000 livres. last account army 29th ulto. following enemy hope 'll stop till either destroyed drove jersey. whole number taken trenton 1100-among 7 field officers-a day 's work 26th cause stocks rise. 's 2 3 o'clock a.m. hardly see. 'll therefore excuse scratch. friend c wm whipple ``

`` william ellery nicholas cooke sir baltimore jany. 4th 1777 inclosed letter honor handed gentleman secret committee told time came via south carolina 21st oct. preparations war making france letter doubtless furnish intelligence subject. since last 1 nothing remarkable hath occurred. several hessians posted trenton since late glorious exploit genl washington found skulking cellars hiding places among one lt colonel deputy adjutant general whole number genl. wrote last january 4 1777 29 30th decr amounted one thousand. important manceuvre hath given great spirits good people jersey pennsylvania flocking states genl. washington. militia lower counties maryland virginia repairing philadelphia. army last accounts rerepassed delaware full pursuit enemy deserted posts river. troops within five miles body hessians said hundred waggons loaded stores c stores probability fall hands least waggons men doubtless move faster taken us main body within eleven miles march enemy. every thing west side north river wears brilliant aspect. genl. heath hath entered hackinsack taken stores amounting large quantity british troops left guard tories. confident shall drive enemy jersey. extremely anxious hear affairs state. late masterly stroke trenton would capital ice prevented execution genls plan parts hope animate neighbouring states urge noble enterprize enemy quarter. much depends upon vigorous efforts winter. large bodies militia trust collected collecting make bold grand burst foes happiness. seize opportunity division force enemies hath given us. reinforcements unless france effectually interpose prevent infallibly sent spring early summer. therefore let repeat seize occasion ill policy enemy presents. burn hostile fleet drive enemy rhode island possible. express deliver carries loan certificates new york new england states. hope plan stopping progress depretiation meet encouragement states. gives great pleasure find state hath appointed committee consult committees new england states upon measures prevent depretiation monopolization. know better way effect first lessning quantity paper-bills latter state connecticutt hath pursued. monopolizing especially distressing time certainly highly criminal demands severe punishment blood political system ought kept pure incorrupt. depretiation money obstructions commerce articles imported risen astonishing height every article keeps pace. thought philadelphia dearest place ever knew. baltimore exceeds. account account distance scene war account dirtiest place ever saw sincerely wish back philadelphia left great reluctance. letter receiv 'd newport 6th dec. led hope wife children escaped newport. prisoners hope promote freedom. great respect yr honor 's obedient humble servant wm ellery ``

`` secret committee john langdon sir secret committee baltimore 4th jan 1777 time ago desired purchase two three ships send virginia south carolina since pleasure hearing hope business good forwardness. 1 desire purchase another ship send france cargo procured place suitable market. doubt masts answer well perhaps articles greater value may procured-however much better judge. wish cargo may valuable ship may dispatched soon possible. many articles much wanted army imagine may obtained islands st peters newfoundland. therefore desire would charter two small vessels fast sailers cargos procured proper market 2 order thence canvas tents sort woolen linen goods suitable soldier 's clothing. drafts committee duly paid whatever sums may want execution business islands st peters meguelon. great respect humble servts richard henry lee f lewis wm whipple ``

`` secret committee robert morris sir baltimore 4th january 1777 thought expence express warranted carry inclosed contents demanding serious attention quickest possible change situation things made observations necessary. true exerted instances unfortunate difficulty getting ships seamen certainly great. however see ballances us considerably west indies europe. consequence credit hurt least mr. schweishauzer seems unwilling go inch beyond hand. good often springs evil friendship loosing topmast made chesapeake safely arrived cargo might fallen enemies hands brig kept delaware. shall take care cargo vessel wish advice assistance. 1 agreed charter done terms approve may immediately loaded tobacco least ordered place judge remittance wanted. sir advise us think best. captain friendship wait return express. see advance made agent arming brig. books secret committee papers illy fitted conducting business properly. mr. gillon imported carolina contract 37,550 lbs. gunpowder 500 stand arms 620 bushels salt paid present £3500 currency part upon account. learn colo. harrison ship sometime loaded son james river remains want seamen. richard henry lee fra. lewis wm. whipple p.s. inclose order meade co. £481.7.11 pen. cury. post coming shall send dispatches. great prospect valuable importations coming delaware makes us anxious wish many swift sailing vessels without give notice. lexington sail hence days purpose ``

`` oliver wolcott john lawrence sir baltimore 4 janry 1777 delivered person mr hillegas sends loan office certificates eastern states also sends order pay first monies shall receive forty thousand dollars upon order government. 1 certificates would sent earlier removal congress place prevented. glad hear people well inclined lodge money office putting money best publick use also means preventing redundancy common circulation. managers state lottery philadelphia heard wheither sent tickets connecticut. already done hope soon money matters object much delicacy utmost importance business war commerce. forwarded letter govr. trumbull left hand wish would transmit. also beg would please forward enclosed. congratulate sir happy success arms jersys 25 ult. farther accounts make number enemy taken action amount least one thousand. flatter shall soon hear farther advantages obtained quarter enemy soon oblidged leave country said oppression brutality shocking beggar description. severity may understand many instances means convincing unbeleiving cruelty power oppresses us. congress directed three thousand cavalry sixteen additional battalions infantry raised together number artillerists passed resolutions relative .army judged necessary give greatest energy impediment delay might prevent fullest exertions military power regulations may soon particularly informed well reasons founded. hope may soon respectable army feild object ought sedulously attended circumstance trust soon confine enemy narrower limits. restrictions exportation lumber taken embargo salted provisions laid till first nov. respect sir obedient humble servant oliver wolcott january 5 1777 p.s. mr sherman came yesterday congress well ``

`` benjamin rush julia rush dear julia baltimore jany. 24. 1777. rode miles badness roads difficulty ferry lazyness diamond convinced acted wisely determining accompany baltimore. upon arrival thankful share trouble met procuring tollerable lodgings. present accommodated room lately occupied mr sergeant must abandon soon returns days. rain fell yesterday rendered streets muddy impassible women. ladies seen abroad carriages. eno expence living tell mr. middleton keeping family tavern rate £100.0.0 week obliged want agreeable accommodations send annapolis thirty miles place. told since arrival assembly intend leave next appointment delegates punishment opposing new government. 1 welcome storm popular rage. shall kiss rod smites. never weary public life never languished sweets domestic life since parted last. wished great deal pleasure frolicking baltimore bid farewell. alas. heart sickens sound commonly called pleasure. state banishment home music coralli would serve encrease melancholly. exchange whole house single room request instead commanding trifling favor wanted give affectionate wife society strangers. lay aside freedom ease unbounded confidence conversation constant restraint formality circumstances illy agree man age disposition. brother 2 lodges tavern perfectly harmonizes complaining baltimore. next letter hope written better humor contain agreeable acct. people make badness place. said kind strangers. adieu dear girl. much love mrs. montgomery family. leave letters dowdle 's tavern christiana bridge come safely post. yours-yours-my dear julia. january 25 1777 ``

`` richard henry lee thomas jefferson dear sir philadelphia april 29th. 1777 consider punctilio suggestions friendship expect answer letters written dispatched another. ever hated ceremonies shall april 29 1777 commence ceremony. wish power give interesting news alas slow assembling army prevents attempt us upon enemy furnish opportunity collecting reenforcements quarters. french ministry assure commissioners succors drawn germany find endeavoring supply deficiencies among tories states connecticut new york new jersey secret emissaries abundance. purposes corruption seems lord howe furnished secretary greatest adept art bribing lives. afraid country furnishes good materials work upon. plan british court find men money disturbed wars settled january last reenforce carleton howe latter enter new england whole force extermination whilst former kept middle colonies awe invading n. york thro lakes. burgoyne 10,000 men chiefly germans attack virginia maryland. southern middle colonies put military government. may relied fact shews wanted shewing merciful spi rit animates leaders enemies council. assure execute field faithful representatives. hands agreed tories formidable us british force leaders among authors mischeif. quere becomes every legislature secure machinations vigorous discouraging laws. realy believe numbers lazy worthless young men induced come forth service country unless states adopt mode recommended congress ordering drafts militia. 1 may induce young lazy take continental bounty rather serve nothing sort. 88 batallions complete adieu british tyranny every chance succeeding. howes army still remains heights near brunswick gen. washington occupy country round. farewell dear sir. regard affectionate friend richard henry lee ``

`` john adams abigail adams monday june 2. 1777 1 artillery election. wish near. 18th reached morning. cause letters long travelling one post week goes hence peeks kill altho two go thence boston. riding every day made better altho yet quite well. determined continue practice necessary. rejoice find town wisdom send one rep resentative. house last year numerous unwieldy. expence great. suppose constitution formed year. moses lycurgus solon. score two. whoever may whatever form may adopted perswaded among mass people fund wisdom integrity humanity preserve happiness tolerable measure. enemy come boston fly little ones philadelphia scarcely get boston campaign. admire sentiments concerning revenge. june 2 1777 revenge ancient days see whole roman history esteemed generous heroic passion. nothing good friend bad enemy. hatred malice without limits enemy indulged justified cruelty thought unwarrantable. saviour taught immorality revenge moral duty forgiving injuries even duty loving enemies. nothing shew amiable moral divine excellency christian doctrines stronger point light characters conduct marius sylla cazsar pompey anthony augustus among innumerable others. retaliation must practice instances order make barbarous foes respect degree rights humanity. never done without palpable necessity. apprehension retaliation alone restrain cruelties would disgrace savages. omit would cruelty officers men. amused reports troops removing r. island n. york staten island c.-waggons boats bridges c. prepared-two old indiamen cutt floating batteries mounting 32 guns sent round delaware r c. c. heed whistling zephyrs. short rather come philadelphia. would purify city dross. either furnace affliction would refine impurities would purged yet fire. town dead weight upon us-it would dead weight also upon enemy. mules would plague money ``

`` john adams abigail adams june 8. 1777 upon invitation board war pensilvania committee appointed days ago go delaware river take view works erected view prevent enemy coming philadelphia water. mr. duer humble servant mr. middleton made committee. 1 yesterday went three boats eight oars. mr. rittenhouse coll. bull coll. deane went pensilvania board war. general arnold general de coudrai experienced french oflicer artillery monsr. le brune engineer mr. rogers aid de camp gen. de coudray company. band musick company agreable upon water. went first billingsport 10 miles river jersey side river obstructed vesseaux de frizes large fort laid great deal work done upon. came back fort island province island river obstructed passage shipps commanded fort 18. 18. pounders. lay fire ships fire rafts floating batteries gallies andrew doria fine new frigate delaware. crossed river went red point jersey side coll. bull thrown strongest works ever seen. dined dinner coll. bull ordered regiment upon parade went exercises maneuvres well. long passage home made 9 clock reached wharf. suffered much heat yet upon whole agreable day. upon return town expected hear news word received. quiet still. long calm continue. begin suspect shall unactive campaign-that shut impregnable post lie still. shall see however think shall trouble whether moves lies still ``

mine. thank god passed happily small pox neither confined disorder 24 hours. journey although would seem long count 7 june 20 july travelled less thirty days. came upper road reached mountains 2d july found air extremely pleasant cool evenings mornings make necessary button coat wastcoat continued approached city. warm enough. last fortnight intensely hot writing open room striped shirt yet moistened oblige use paper hand nights worse. fear friends charles town must suffer perhaps may refreshing breezes sea shut breezes. journey found every plentiful crops grain together cotton flax hemp almost every house looms linen woolen less eight children. country delightful heavy complaints want salt. many articles scarce dear people either without find substitute. believe scarcely salt enough serve ensuing winter 's provision. nevertheless seem general contented bear inconveniencies preference british taxes. scarcely find tory disaffected person righteous cause among back settled people part country. sir william howe obliged abandon new jersey take new step distress us embarked troops horse foot near new york 5th 21st july 23d sailed sandy hook fleet 250 sail great small three indians sight british troops unhappy people remained quietly lands obediance mr. burgoyne 's proclamation. every body hopes cruel progress stopped general gates well acquainted country say retreat artifice whole behaviour court. opinion much forward offers treaty. british court hand made proposition concession new foundland fishery. waiting see bid possibly make meantime benefiting trade insulting flag commerce poor old england degree must gall high spirited nation. tis true france lent us large sum money pass credit friendship. best security world principal interest may raise bank england whenever pleases may compel us repay upon terms. midle rank people many higher degree panting success full prospect participating liberty. nothing natural king court enjoy prospect losing thousands subjects question time must solve. upon whole confidence france take one step us lead interest security. would lead hours conversation. consequence ports blocked scarcity articles wont imported abroad advanced prices. met advances nearly equal part farmer labourer-a schedule inclose. people therefore concerned merchandize farming hold profitable office government bear weight `` samuel chase thomas johnson dear sir philada. septr. 13. 1777 saturday 11oclocka.m. wrote express yesterday afternoon inclosing order mr. harwood 30,000 dollars. received 20,000 dolls. mr smith send day two. seen several generals many officers universally agreed 600 killed wounded enemy killed wounded double number. september 13 1777 troops high spirits. intelligence genl. howe sent n york rhode island immediate reinforcement 4000. ordered 1500 peaks kiln. jersey assembly voted preparing send three days 4000 militia. give bounty £4 man. captains pockett found copy mr. howes orderly book gen. washington says collects thence howe 's force 8 10,000 men. mr howe tents none officers. battle 14,000 regulars including officers 5,000 militia encreasing. yesterday noon mr. howe removed place battle. congress given brevet commissions officers came mr ducoudray. two monsieur auguste le brun able engineer monsieur_______ pierre skilful artillerist sent give advice assistance defending towns teaching artillery. 1 gentlemen experienced officers. doubt give polite reception. would amiss get person master language generally attentive wants prevent imposed. complain disrespect imposition. would proper young gentlemen endeavor learn art. would proper accurate survey plot harbours grounds near balt. annapolis. adieu. friend s. chase p.s. smallwood gist. nat gist indians ``

`` cornelius harnett william wilkinson dear sir philadelphia sepr. 13th 1777 received favour 26th august 15th yet come hand. arrival cap merredith prize gives pleasure. hopes saving voyage perhaps profitable one. 5th letter wrote since arrival acknowledged receipt one. every time inclosed last papers. find battle shad 's ford upon brandywine brave troops obliged leave field entirely owing mistake intelligence received. army however high spirits desirous another brush enemy last accounts still remain field. best accounts yet received loss sustained us 400 killed wounded gentleman lately near field battle informed inhabitants part country viewed dead least three one killd enemy. supposed genl. howe soon recovers late fatigue proceed sweeds ford upon schoolkiln 16 miles city meet hope deserts. often requested would send every intelligence meet relative southern colonies surely may meet. carolina paper. must beg let mrs. harnett know post sets may pleasure one letter beg inclose. let know received intelligence brig. amazing price every necessary convenience life arisen. still last purchased would sell £2000 currency-common rum 32/6 per gall jamca. spirits 60/ every article proportion common riding horse £150. altho enemy 's army near city congress september 13 1777 determined remove neither unless forced. hast sir obed servt. cornl. harnett ``

`` john adams diary 1777. thursday. septr. 25. rode bethlehem allan town yesterday german tavern 18 miles reading. rode morning reading breakfasted heard certain mr. howes army crossed schuylkill. coll. hartley gave account late battle enemy general wayne. 1 hartley thinks place improper battle ought retreat ``

`` charles carroll sr. dr. father lancaster 25th septr. 1777. arrived yesterday. believe shall make congress tomorrow. expect enemy took possession pha. yesterday evening morning. garrison fort hold day perhaps mr. howe may repent going pha. general washington assembling collecting troops sides. army much broken late marches days rest hope revive strength spirits. gen. washington crossed schuylkill full intention attacking enemy great rain fell last wednesday prevented battle. amunition got much damaged army obliged retire strong grounds get fresh ammunition. affectionate son ch. carroll carrollton p.s. post soon established baltimore town correspondence regular frequent ``

`` samuel chase thomas johnson dear sir lancaster septr. 25. 1777. dropt line reading day yesterday 1 received letter 16th. write express carrying orders virginia militia. expect shall make congress sunday expect regular conveyance established weekly baltimore. 23rd septr. 1777 `` enemy variety perplexing manouvres thro country cod. derive least intelligence man disaffected contrived pass schuylkill last night flatland fords neighbourhood. marched immediately towards philada imagine advanced parties near city night. far got start reced certain intelligence considerable number crossed found vain think overtaking rear troops harrassed constant marching since battle brandewyne therefore concluded advice general officers march place near potts grove tomorrow morning towards philadelphia way endeavor form junction continental troops general mcdougal peekskill jersey militia genl. dickinson september 25 1777 hope side delaware. also obliged wait genls. wayne smallwood left upon side schuilkill hopes falling upon enemy 's rear eluded well us.\ `` extract g.w. congress. 2 hear enemies advanced parties entered city yesterday evening. 1000 g. washington 's army without shoes stockings. 500 genl. waynes division lost blankets late shameful surprise. lost 272 dead prisoners wounded missing affair. militia behaved ill many run quite arms. officers behaved remarkably well. would 3 proper take measures carry back. one higginson lived annapolis went saml. thence run away concerned conspiracy fort pitt well known whetcroft quynn. highly expedient secured soon possible. genl. hand sent probable get eastern shore. president arrived evening. letter genl. gates-nothing important quarter. 7000 lincoln 5000. hope give good account mr. burgoyne. possible desirous assembly shod. meet. absolutely necessary take measures procure supply military stores. meet instantly attend. compliments gentlemen 4 council. adieu affectionate obedient servant saml chase ``

`` elbridge gerry george washington sir lancaster sepr 25th 1777 3 0clock p.m. wrote line yesterday desiring impower mr. henry place collect fire arms wanted virginia troops march camp since letter 23d received desiring number blankets shoes may also collected. 1 seen mr. henry within half hour informs collected already 250 arms shall able obtain many. also says 300 pair shoes went morning general wayne proceed collecting many pair shoes blankets procured september 26 1777 propriety taken inhabitants town farmers neighbourhood thereof. therefore pleased enlarge c powers proposed given excellency mr. henry authorize collect articles last mentioned. 2 colo r h lee present directed letter commandg officer militia frederick town maryland ordering militia armed 500 unarmed supplyed place. honor sir much esteem excellency 's hum serv. e gerry ``

`` cornelius harnett william wilkinson dr sir lancaster 25 septr. 1777 congress obliged leave philadelphia supposed genl. howe possession altho every effort genl. washingtons power made use prevent. perhaps may remain long security. genl. gates 's army strong northward battle burgoin daily expected successful quarter measure compensate loss great city. congress yet met several members arrived soon meet oppertunity offers shall write fully. make compliments mr. hooper maclain friends. shall days pleasure write. cap medici setting. time enlarge. esteem dr sir friend obed servt. cornl. harnett ``

`` john hancock george washington sir lancaster 26 september 1777 arriv 'd last eveng place honour 'd letter 23d inst. shall lay congress soon whole members arrive expect day. september 26 1777 inclos 'd letters commodore hazelwood capt. alexander marine committee judg 'd best forward least induce exert last left open perusal please seal send forward rout shall determine properest. sir excellency 's obedt huml servt. john hancock presidt ``

`` marine committee charles alexander sir 1 lancaster septemr. 26th 1777 future safety philadelphia public good greatly depend upon preventing enemies fleet getting town succoring army desired co-operate full freindly manner land sea forces continental state pennsylvania effecting valuable purpose. expected exert every art valour vigilance address suggest well prevent enemy philadelphia possessing fort keep british fleet getting. probability either provisions ammunition failing let timely care taken get supplied general washington army neighbourhood philadelphia city. fort passage river bravely properly defended possession philada probably turn ruin british army. established reputation valour makes unnecessary say brave minds never despair every thing hazarded public good require. brave american forces therefore keep defences river delaware last extremity. every resource valour skill fail becomes absolutely impossible hold longer push continental vessels far swim river defended long possible must destroyed rather suffer fall enemies hands. found fort mifflin must given use utmost endeavours bring garrison convoy troops place safety. congress already determined defending delaware continental marine officers shall command commodore state accordingly observe pay due regard resolve. september 27 1777 wishing honourable success sir hble servants ``

`` marine committee john hazelwood sir 1 lancaster 26th september 1777 great importance future safety philadelphia public good defences river delaware fall enemies hands fleet suffered get city orders day sent commander continental armed vessels subordinate command defending river. doubt joint vigourous efforts employed defend passage river last extreamity last must given expected assist removing troops fort mifflin place safety. knowledge river best enable determine may necessary sink vessels obstructions order supply vacancies cheveaux de frize already sunk prevent enemy bringing many vessels bear fort. vessels necessary purpose hereby authorized take supply. wish success sir humble servants ``

`` george washington dear sir lancaster 27th septr. 1777. conversation mr. peters secretary board informs month june last 1000 tin cartridges boxes sent army delivered captain september 27 1777 french. mr. peters moreover informs certain knowledge several cartridges boxes converted soldiers cantenes officers shaving boxes. commissary flowers also acquainted carlile upwards 2000 tin cartridges boxes wanted army may immediately sent. sorry observe two officers high command army said much addicted liquor trust confidence reposed men. may disconcert wisest best laid plans men ought removed command army example besides mischief may occasioned clouded muddled brain pernicious influence others removed command. 1 could wish know excellencys sentiments subject. interest best glorious cause ought sacrificed false delicacy times put competition interests great community. nothing severe punishments opinion make commissaries quartermasters attentive duty excellency power hope want punish deserve punishment. hope excellency excuse freedom letter zeal country wishes success impelled write thus freely subject claims attention reformation army abuses prevalent two important departments quarter master commissary general. much esteem yr. excellencys obedt. hum. servt. ch. carroll carrollton ``

`` cornelius harnett richard caswell sir lancaster sepr. 27. 1777 honor writing excellency days ago philadelphia since congress obliged decamp genl. many different maneouvers got army city pleases take possession. seems intention come another battle army first. genl. washington day two reinforced 1500 regulars genl. mcdugal peekskiln 2000 virginians hope able circumvent howes schemes. meet severe check scituation rendered uneasy september 27 1777 picture lancaster pennsylvania 24 september 27 1777 entirely ruined. genl. gates army northward strong every reason hourly expect good news quarter. thought genl burgoyn must fight retire either must put end time hostilities quarter hope. congress intends proceed business day. send excellency news papers yet. messrs. burk penn neither arrived. expect today. great regard excellencys obed huml servt. cornl. harnett ``

washington midst enemies disaffected cause deficient. twice determined give enemy battle unhappily dissapointed first excessive rain entirely wet ruined cartridges army provided order attack enemy immediately leave city minute spare tho proved mistake may depend upon soon wing made flight speed trenton arrived early day. thence journeyd bethlem reading lancaster place agreed 1 adjourn congress fortifying heights near german town. genll washington reinforced mcdougles brigade peekskills jersey militia 2000 maryland number virginia last come forward road others passing thro place join. must cent. 2 sent home express useless worn cloathing ``

`` charles carroll sr. dr papa york 29th septr. 1777 congress thinking secure light parties enemy lancaster adjourned place probably remain whole winter. course days regular post established baltimore eastward hope correspondence regular. written several letters recd. one since left home. shall write days winter cloaths servant money. shall send list want molly desire love also mama. gen. washington 's army gathering strength recovering late fatigues. howe got pha. last thursday army lay german town city. believe trust pha. another battle fought. shipping come till fort taken cheveaux de frise raised. last letter gates dated 15th instant. burgoyne west side north river lincoln rear 5000 east side gates west side 13 bridges build could get burgoyne burgoyne action could happen 25th month thereabouts. northern army kept together think prudent management burgoyne find equal difficult retreat advance. state pena. either disaffected governt. weak become rather burthen strength union. unless finish campaign successfully fear shall able support expence another. wish long enjoyt. health yr. affec. son 1 c.c. carrollton ``

`` john adams abigail adams york town pensylvania best friend septr. 30. 1777 tuesday long time since opportunity writing fear suffered unnecessary anxiety account. morning 19th inst congress allarmed beds letter mr. hamilton one general washingtons family enemy possession ford schuylkill boats power philadelphia morning. papers congress belonging secretary 's office war office treasury office c. sent bristol. president gentlemen gone road followed friend mr. merchant rhode island trenton jersies. stayed trenton untill 21 set easton upon forks delaware. easton went bethlehem thence reading thence lancaster thence town dozen miles susquehannah river. congress sit. order convey papers safety importance members induced take circuit near 180 miles whereas town directest road 88 miles philadelphia. tour given opportunity seeing many parts country never saw. morning major throop arrived large packett general gates containing agreable intelligence 1 need repeat much earlier intelligence part. wish affairs wore pleasing aspect. alass. shall avoid every thing like history make reflections. however general washington condition tolerably respectable militia turning virginia maryland pensilvania small numbers. apology made part world mr. howes march elke philadelphia thro regions passive obedience. whole country thro passed inhabited quakers. another body quakers america perhaps world. still opinion philadelphia loss us. comfortably situated house general roberdeau whose hospitality taken mr. amuel dams mr. g erry. health good common assure spirits worse loss philadelphia. biddle continental frigate s. carolina made noble cruise taken four valuable w.i. prizes. september 30 1777 continue write post shall pay debts ``

`` samuel chase thomas johnson dr sir york. septr. 30 1777 tuesday noon since writing morning 1 congress received letters genl. gates substance almost words wilkinsons letter. inclosed list loss. gates 7000 effective rank file 2,000 militia marching reinforce. adieu chase ``

`` john hancock george washington sir york town pennsylvania sepr. 30th. 1777. since departure philadelphia acknowledge receipt favrs. 23d inst. met congress saturday last lancaster upon consultation judged prudent adjourn place deliberate prosecute business without interruption dispatches meet us. reciev 'd general gates 's aid de camp major troup sundry letters copies honour inclose appears affairs northern department wear favourable aspect hope soon transmit account issue contest quarter. wish soon receive pleasing accounts daily expectation agreeable tidings genl. howe totally reduced. beg leave refer inclosed papers utmost respect esteem sir obedt. hble servt. john hancock presidt p.s. inclos 'd send south carolina paper see success capt biddle frigate randolph met perus 'd ask favr. please order deliver 'd coll. pinkney south carolina camp september 30 1777 whose paper requested south carolina delegates first sent ``

`` cornelius harnett richard caswell dear sir. york town pennsylvania sept 30. 1777 take liberty inform excellency congress last fixed town probability remain time. express day received genl gates informs congress action happened 19th instant within three miles stillwater army command enemy genl burguoyn. continued several hours night put stop. armies retreated encampments leaving field disputed another day. left wing army engaged whole british foreign troops. heavy brisk fire kept sides 2 lieut colls 3 captains 3 subs 2 sergeants 2 drummers phifers 51 rank file killed. several officers 180 odd wounded. enemy 's loss considerable supposed least 1200 killed wounded. said prisoners deserters genl burguoin received wound shoulder. situation critical sanguine expectation hearing days meeting total defeat. genl lincoln taken party sent army 200 battallions i.e. batteaux lake george lake champlaine upwards 200 prisoners arms released 100 men prisoners quarter supposed successful attack made ticonderoga soon. wish power give excellency pleasing account affairs quarter genl howe possession philadelphia pleases. genl washington 's army upon schuylkill betwixt reading philadelphia reinforcement 1500 regulars genl. mcdugal joined upwards 2000 virginians march purpose. believed genl washington march philadelphia near another general battle fought days. enemy yet possession river. troops armed vessels intend defend fort last extremity. firing heard saturday last continued hours supposed enemy 's ships fort. particulars yet received congress. shall happy receive line often find leisure. september 30 1777 messrs burke penn yet arrived expect every hour. great respect excellency 's obt huml servt. cornl harnett ``

drawing supplies around pass. wod. subsist army around far possible rout enemy. private sentiments communicate without reserve regarded disregarded shall judge best. conduct wod. often hurt feelings `` henry marchant nicholas cooke honored sir york state pensylvania sepr. 30th. 1777 fryday morning congress left city philadelphia consequence british armys gaining banks schuylkill fording place 17 miles city since possessed city. genl. washington enemys movements expected determined cross considerable distance indeed meant attack upon redding considerable stores. short number fording places seems rendered impracticable hinder passing. entered city last thursday. genl. washington approaching city. army daily reinforcing. genl. mcdougall joind 1500 new engd. continentals six hundred jersey millitia. virginians marching thro town daily great spirit. still possession river reinforced strongly fort island defends cheveau de frize. floating batteries fire ships gallies hopes defence hows fleet attempt come. army rear must cutt resources enemys army till shall thought expedient make general attack. think well disposed till better disposed. congratulate sir upon successes northward general prospect completing glorious campaign. hope blessing heaven think rational expectations. honored sir yr. obedt humble servt. hy. marchant p.s. enclosed letter handed one delegates. carolina beg yr. particular care ``

`` daniel roberdeau thomas wharton sir york town octr. 1 1777 general gates 's letters enclosures congress per express day refered committee intelligence publication sent afternoon lancaster purpose 1 therefore transcripts less necessary would furnish satisfaction council unwell thereby might furnished news hours sooner. express give verbal account two spys decoied continental troops round genl. clinton 's quarters habited like unto brittish soldiers purpose. spy 's asked landed told day before-where gen. clinton thing communicate told counducted him-when came presence october 1 1777 much surprise said genl. clinton enquired replied could business accordingly ordered hanged hour upon discovering important intelligence respited. consiquence information c genl. clinton govr. clinton genl. putnam suddenly motion number troops command number enemy movements unknown. singular anecdote must omit. one spys discovered swollowed small silver ball made disgorge immediate application emetic contained intelligence brittish officer clinton commanded highlands genl. burgoyne. anecdotes published depended nevertheless beleive offered amusement. respectful salutation council sir yr. obt. huml. serv. daniel roberdeau ``

`` nathaniel folsom meshech weare sir york. state pensylvania oct. 2d. 1777 arrived place 28th september ninety miles west philadelphia congress setling. genl. took possession phila. last fryday. large stores reading lancaster c greater objects us city philadelphia enemy making frequent attempts get westward genl. washington order destroy stores many fording places schuylkill genl. washington obliged string army twenty miles said river weakened degree together frequent marches counter marches enemy crossed genl. washington fifteen miles without possibility overtaking. however reinforced 1000 men peekskill commanded genl. mcdougall one battallion state troops virginia 1000 millitia. 1000 march join army days. also 1000 maryland jersey millitia also joined army. letter genl. washington informed us days intended attack enemy 1 troops good spirits altho enemy got phila. yet doubt able give good account. possession october 2 1777 river deleware fire ships fire rafts gallie floating batteries c doubt mr. 's situation made disagreable. sincerely congratulate sir upon success army northern department hopefull prospect success divine blessing may attend arms end preserve invaluable liberties sincere prayer obedient humble servant nathl. folsom ``

`` elbridge gerry joseph trumbull dear sir york pennsylvania octr 2d 1777 recd 16th sepr. attended treasury late want health unacquainted order board rect letter. 1 think request reasonable philadelphia hands enemy accomodated place congress shall meet objections removal commissioners undoubtedly many easily answered. board meets shall propose reversal order. 2 loss philadelphia unexpected state pennsylvania delaware maryland question whether would happened general washington 's army reinforced day two 3000 virginia militia 1500 continental troops peeks kill 1000 jersey militia hope soon recovered. new commissaries appear well acquainted business army one whole day without provisions. fear consequences alterations well know contrary repeated remonstrances. congratulate agreable prospects northern department much esteem sincerely e gerry ``

`` william williams jonathan trumbull sr. 2d oct 1777 thursday since mr brown arrived pleasure honor kind favour rejoyce hear welfare dear friends. nothing directly genl washington 2 3 days hear approached nearer howe probably important action soon insue. also enemy taken delaware frigate river ships able get master commanded dont know name came wharf tis supposed gave sold. help expect demolish ships fire craft c c confident defending river near cheavaux de frize soon fleet possession. true language cant express feelings towd accursed villain. 1 capt biddle randolph carrd charlestown s. cara 4 important prizes one 20 gun 700 puncheons rum 300 hds sugar c rest valuable. please acknowledge genl huntington mr sherman mr hosmer receipt agreable favors. regret cod answer colleagues obliged write much c impossible intervals congress meeting twice day. 2 mr law writes mr. hosmer respectful compliments attend gentlemen kindly accept mr wales 's compliments col dyers letter. may god mercy appear help salvation glory forever. room add ever greatest respect affection dutiful obedt w williams p.s. friendly sincere compliments col. jos. t. bror davd. jona. home. tho dont often mention tis ever forget hond dear mother trumbull ``

`` samuel chase thomas johnson dear sir york town. october 3d. 1777 last days ago express transmitted intelligence north since heard nothing quarter. flatter campain close honor success indeed sanguine expect hear total defeat burgoyne. beleive enclosed amount army genl gates 15 septr. total 6,618 rank files 664 commd. officers 718 serjeants 308 drums fifes artillery 158 fit duty sick present 317 sick absent 1384. regulars. genl. lincoln 5000 militia. heard genl. washington since 29 septr. army marching towards city. assembly meet submit propriety recommending draft militia recruit quota suppose trial must made small part e.g fifteenth produce 2000. time service must less year suppose substitutes accepted. mode draft adopted. absolutely necessary fall measures furnish militia quota arms latter cloaths tents c c. know two ways effect importation manufacturing former trade probably answer. would propose send employ agent courts versailles madrid apply courts supply state wth 10,000 stand good arms 20 brass field pieces 4 12 pounders 10 howits 6 9 inches cloathing compleat 5000 men ravens duck tents number soldiers 10,000 pair stockings 10,000 pair shoes sent frigate force risque paid state produce within three years end present war great britain. would govr. council authorised give exceeding 20 dollars stand arms state would exempt persons actually employed particular manufactories military duty. confederacy resumed day. know receive letter friendly manner wrote therefore offer apology. farewell. affectionate obedt. servant chase ``

`` john penn richard caswell dear sir york town oct. 16th. 1777. minute informed victory obtained genl gates genl burgoyne. attacked forced lines took 500 prisoners killed many got 9 brass field pieces 9 12 lbs 330 tents kettles c. enemy retreated night pursuit towards ticonderoga. loss trifling except genls. arnold lincoln wounded legs. great officers. late battle genls. washington howe north carolina troops engaged behaved well. capt. martin arrested cowardice. heard event. genl nash died two days. col polk 's son wounded bad. expect another battle soon. son well. due respect sir obet servt. j. penn p.s. excuse haste little paper ``
